ingredients: 2 chicken breast fillets (each about 175g), cut into strips
2 carrots, peeled, cut in half or thirds and sliced lengthways
2 red onions, peeled and cut into wedges
2 small courgettes, halved lengthways and sliced
2-3 tsp Thai green curry paste (according to taste)
1 stalk lemon grass, crushed a little with the back of a knife
1 hazelnut-sized piece fresh root ginger, peeled and finely chopped
30 g fresh Thai basil, 5 sprigs left whole, remainder chopped
